title: nAradha gaana
sahitya:
nArada gAna rasikapriyE vara nArada (gAna)

shAradE satcidA nandamaya

anupallavi

Aruyir nalampeRa aruntavam Endiya

peraruT kaDal tiru gnAnAnandan uvanda

caraNam

pA magaLE parama pAvani

pAmarajana pari pAlini

yAmanu dinam tozhum guru haridAsanin

nAma sankIrttana mArgam tanil negizhnda
